   32:          suite/0,
   33:          all/0,
   34:          groups/0,
   35:          init_per_suite/1,
   36:          end_per_suite/1,
   37:          init_per_group/2,
   38:          end_per_group/2,
   39:          init_per_testcase/2,
   40:          end_per_testcase/2
   41:         ]).
   42: 
   43: -export([
   44:          always_ok/1,
   45:          app_test/1,
   46:          appup_test/1,
   47:          basic_test/1,
   48:          check_error/1,
   49:          cli/1,
   50:          cli_exit_normal/1,
   51:          cli_exit_status/1,
   52:          close/1,
   53:          daemon_already_started/1,
   54:          daemon_error_closes_port/1,
   55:          daemon_opt_fd/1,
   56:          double_close/1,
   57:          exec/1,
   58:          exec_compressed/1,
   59:          exec_with_io_in/1,
   60:          exec_with_io_out/1,
   61:          host_equal/2,
   62:          idle_time_client/1,
   63:          idle_time_server/1,
   64:          inet6_option/0,
   65:          inet6_option/1,
   66:          inet_option/1,
   67:          internal_error/1,
   68:          ips/1,
   69:          key_callback/1,
   70:          key_callback_options/1,
   71:          known_hosts/1,
   72:          login_bad_pwd_no_retry1/1,
   73:          login_bad_pwd_no_retry2/1,
   74:          login_bad_pwd_no_retry3/1,
   75:          login_bad_pwd_no_retry4/1,
   76:          login_bad_pwd_no_retry5/1,
   77:          max_initial_idle_time/1,
   78:          misc_ssh_options/1,
   79:          multi_daemon_opt_fd/1,
   80:          openssh_zlib_basic_test/1,
   81:          packet_size/1,
   82:          pass_phrase/1,

   84:          send/1,

   86:          shell/1,
   87:          shell_exit_status/1,

   89:          shell_socket/1,

   91:          shell_unicode_string/1,
   92:          ssh_file_is_auth_key/1,
   93:          ssh_file_is_host_key/0,
   94:          ssh_file_is_host_key/1,
   95:          ssh_file_is_host_key_misc/1,
   96:          ssh_info_print/1
   97:         ]).
   98: 
   99: 
  100: -define(NEWLINE, <<"\r\n">>).
  101: 
  102: -define(REKEY_DATA_TMO, 1 * 60000). % Should be multiples of 60000
  103: 
  104: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  105: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  106: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  107: 
  108: suite() ->
  109:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
  110:      {timetrap,{seconds,90}}].
  111: 
  112: all() -> 
  113:     [{group, all_tests}
  114:     ].
  115: 
  116: %%%-define(PARALLEL, ).
  117: -define(PARALLEL, parallel).
  118: 
  119: groups() ->
  120:     [{all_tests, [?PARALLEL], [{group, sequential},
  121:                                {group, p_basic},
  122:                                {group, internal_error},
  123:                                {group, login_bad_pwd_no_retry},
  124:                                {group, key_cb}
  125:                               ]},
  126: 
  127:      {sequential, [], [app_test,
  128:                        appup_test,
  129:                        daemon_already_started,
  130:                        daemon_error_closes_port, % Should be re-written..
  131:                        double_close,
  132:                        daemon_opt_fd,
  133:                        multi_daemon_opt_fd,
  134:                        packet_size,
  135:                        ssh_info_print,
  136:                        shell_exit_status,
  137:                        setopts_getopts,
  138:                        known_hosts,
  139:                        ssh_file_is_host_key,
  140:                        ssh_file_is_host_key_misc,
  141:                        ssh_file_is_auth_key
  142:                       ]},
  143: 
  144:      {key_cb, [?PARALLEL], [key_callback, key_callback_options]},
  145: 
  146:      {internal_error, [?PARALLEL], [internal_error]},
  147: 
  148:      {login_bad_pwd_no_retry, [?PARALLEL], [login_bad_pwd_no_retry1,
  149:                                             login_bad_pwd_no_retry2,
  150:                                             login_bad_pwd_no_retry3,
  151:                                             login_bad_pwd_no_retry4,
  152:                                             login_bad_pwd_no_retry5
  153:                                            ]},
  154:      
  155:      {p_basic, [?PARALLEL], [send, peername_sockname,
  156:                              exec, exec_compressed, 
  157:                              exec_with_io_out, exec_with_io_in,
  158:                              cli, cli_exit_normal, cli_exit_status,
  159:                              idle_time_client, idle_time_server,
  160:                              max_initial_idle_time,
  161:                              openssh_zlib_basic_test,
  162:                              misc_ssh_options, inet_option, inet6_option,
  163:                              shell, shell_socket, shell_ssh_conn, shell_no_unicode, shell_unicode_string,
  164:                              close
  165:                             ]}
  166:     ].
  167: 
  168: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  169: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  170:     ?CHECK_CRYPTO(begin
  171:                       ssh:start(),
  172:                       ct:log("Pub keys setup for: ~p",
  173:                              [ssh_test_lib:setup_all_user_host_keys(Config)]),
  174:                       Config
  175:                   end).
  176: 
  177: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  178:     ssh:stop().
  179: 
  180: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  181: init_per_group(key_cb, Config) ->
  182:     case lists:member('ssh-rsa',
  183: 		      ssh_transport:supported_algorithms(public_key)) of
  184: 	true ->
  185:             DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  186:             PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  187:             ssh_test_lib:setup_user_key('ssh-rsa', DataDir, PrivDir),
  188:             ssh_test_lib:setup_host_key_create_dir('ssh-rsa', DataDir, PrivDir),
  189:             Config;
  190: 	false ->
  191: 	    {skip, unsupported_pub_key}
  192:     end;
  193: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
  194:     Config.
  195: 
  196: 
  197: end_per_group(_, Config) ->
  198:     Config.
  199: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  200: init_per_testcase(TC, Config) when TC==shell_no_unicode ; 
  201: 				   TC==shell_unicode_string ->
  202:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  203:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  204:     SysDir =  proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  205:     Sftpd = {_Pid, _Host, Port} =       
  206: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
  207: 			     {user_dir, PrivDir},
  208: 			     {user_passwords, [{"foo", "bar"}]}]),
  209:     ct:sleep(500),
  210:     IO = ssh_test_lib:start_io_server(),
  211:     Shell = ssh_test_lib:start_shell(Port, IO, [{user_dir,UserDir},
  212: 						{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  213: 						{user,"foo"},{password,"bar"}]),
  214:     ct:log("IO=~p, Shell=~p, self()=~p",[IO,Shell,self()]),
  215:     ct:log("file:native_name_encoding() = ~p,~nio:getopts() = ~p",
  216: 	   [file:native_name_encoding(),io:getopts()]),
  217:     wait_for_erlang_first_line([{io,IO}, {shell,Shell}, {sftpd, Sftpd}  | Config]);
  218: 
  219: init_per_testcase(inet6_option, Config) ->
  220:     case ssh_test_lib:has_inet6_address() of
  221: 	true ->
  222: 	    init_per_testcase('__default__', Config);
  223: 	false ->
  224: 	    {skip,"No ipv6 interface address"}
  225:     end;
  226: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  227:     Config.
  228: 
  229: end_per_testcase(TC, Config) when TC==shell_no_unicode ; 
  230: 				  TC==shell_unicode_string ->
  231:     case proplists:get_value(sftpd, Config) of
  232: 	{Pid, _, _} ->
  233: 	    catch ssh:stop_daemon(Pid);
  234: 	_ ->
  235: 	    ok
  236:     end,
  237:     end_per_testcase(Config);
  238: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  239:     end_per_testcase(Config).
  240: 
  241: end_per_testcase(_Config) ->
  242:     ok.
  243: 
  244: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  245: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  246: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  247: %%% Application consistency test.
  248: app_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  249:     test_server:app_test(ssh),
  250:     ok.
  251: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  252: %%% Appup file consistency test.
  253: appup_test(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  254:     ok = test_server:appup_test(ssh).
  255: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  256: %%% Test that we can set some misc options not tested elsewhere
  257: %%% some options not yet present are not decided if we should support or
  258: %%% if they need their own test case.
  259: misc_ssh_options(Config) when is_list(Config) ->  
  260:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  261:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  262:     
  263:     CMiscOpt0 = [{connect_timeout, 1000}, {user_dir, UserDir}, {silently_accept_hosts, true}],
  264:     CMiscOpt1 = [{connect_timeout, infinity}, {user_dir, UserDir}, {silently_accept_hosts, true}],
  265:     SMiscOpt0 =  [{user_dir, UserDir}, {system_dir, SystemDir}],
  266:     SMiscOpt1 =  [{user_dir, UserDir}, {system_dir, SystemDir}],
  267: 
  268:     basic_test([{client_opts, CMiscOpt0}, {server_opts, SMiscOpt0}]),
  269:     basic_test([{client_opts, CMiscOpt1}, {server_opts, SMiscOpt1}]).
  270: 
  271: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  272: %%% Test configuring IPv4
  273: inet_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->   
  274:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  275:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  276:     
  277:     ClientOpts =  [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  278: 		   {user_dir, UserDir},
  279: 		   {user_interaction, false}],
  280:     ServerOpts = [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  281: 		  {user_dir, UserDir},
  282: 		  {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}], 
  283: 
  284:     basic_test([{client_opts, [{inet, inet} | ClientOpts]}, 
  285: 		{server_opts, [{inet, inet} | ServerOpts]}]).
  286: 
  287: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  288: %%% Test configuring IPv6
  289: inet6_option() -> [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}].
  290: inet6_option(Config) when is_list(Config) ->   
  291:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  292:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  293:     
  294:     ClientOpts =  [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  295: 		   {user_dir, UserDir},
  296: 		   {user_interaction, false}],
  297:     ServerOpts = [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  298: 		  {user_dir, UserDir},
  299: 		  {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}], 
  300: 
  301:     basic_test([{client_opts, [{inet, inet6} | ClientOpts]}, 
  302: 		{server_opts, [{inet, inet6} | ServerOpts]}]).
  303: 
  304: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  305: %%% Test api function ssh_connection:exec
  306: exec(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  307:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  308:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  309:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  310:     
  311:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  312: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  313: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  314:     ConnectionRef =
  315: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  316: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  317: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  318:     {ok, ChannelId0} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  319:     success = ssh_connection:exec(ConnectionRef, ChannelId0,
  320: 				  "1+1.", infinity),
  321:     Data0 = {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId0, 0, <<"2">>}},
  322:     case ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(Data0) of
  323: 	expected ->
  324: 	    ok;
  325: 	Other0 ->
  326: 	    ct:fail(Other0)
  327:     end,
  328:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId0),
  329: 
  330:     %% Test that it is possible to start a new channel and
  331:     %% run an other exec on the same connection.
  332:     {ok, ChannelId1} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  333:     success = ssh_connection:exec(ConnectionRef, ChannelId1,
  334: 				  "2+2.", infinity),
  335:     Data1 = {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId1, 0, <<"4">>}},
  336:     case ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(Data1) of
  337: 	expected ->
  338: 	    ok;
  339: 	Other1 ->
  340: 	    ct:fail(Other1)
  341:     end,
  342:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId1),
  343:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  344:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  345: 
  346: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  347: %%% Test api function ssh_connection:exec with erlang server and the Command
  348: %%% makes io
  349: exec_with_io_out(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  350:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  351:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  352:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  353:     
  354:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  355: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  356: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  357:     ConnectionRef =
  358: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  359: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  360: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  361:     {ok, ChannelId0} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  362:     success = ssh_connection:exec(ConnectionRef, ChannelId0,
  363: 				  "io:write(hej).", infinity),
  364:     case ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(
  365:            [{ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId0, 0, <<"hej">>}},
  366:             {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId0, 0, <<"ok">>}},
  367:             {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {eof, ChannelId0}},
  368:             {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {exit_status, ChannelId0, 0}},
  369:             {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {closed, ChannelId0}}
  370:            ]) of
  371:         expected ->
  372:             ok;
  373:         Other0 ->
  374: 	    ct:fail(Other0)
  375:     end,
  376:     ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  377:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  378: 
  379: exec_with_io_in(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  380:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  381:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  382:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  383:     
  384:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  385: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  386: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  387:     C = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  388: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  389: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  390:     {ok, Ch} = ssh_connection:session_channel(C, infinity),
  391:     ssh_connection:exec(C, Ch, "io:read('% ').", 1000),
  392: 
  393:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result_or_fail({ssh_cm, C, {data,Ch,0,<<"% ">>}}),
  394:     ok = ssh_connection:send(C, Ch, "hej.\n", 10000),
  395: 
  396:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result_or_fail({ssh_cm, C, {data,Ch,0,<<"{ok,hej}">>}}),
  397:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(C, Ch),
  398:     ssh:close(C),
  399:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  400: 
  401: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  402: %%% Test that compression option works
  403: exec_compressed(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  404:     case ssh_test_lib:ssh_supports(zlib, compression) of
  405: 	false ->
  406: 	    {skip, "zlib compression is not supported"};
  407: 
  408: 	true ->
  409: 	    process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  410: 	    SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  411: 	    UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
  412: 
  413: 	    {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  414: 						     {preferred_algorithms,[{compression, [zlib]}]},
  415: 						     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  416:     
  417: 	    ConnectionRef =
  418: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  419: 						  {user_dir, UserDir},
  420: 						  {user_interaction, false}]),
  421: 	    {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  422: 	    success = ssh_connection:exec(ConnectionRef, ChannelId,
  423: 					  "1+1.", infinity),
  424: 	    Data = {ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId, 0, <<"2">>}},
  425: 	    case ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_result(Data) of
  426: 		expected ->
  427: 		    ok;
  428: 		Other ->
  429: 		    ct:fail(Other)
  430: 	    end,
  431: 	    ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId),
  432: 	    ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  433: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid)
  434:     end.
  435: 
  436: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  437: %%% Idle timeout test
  438: idle_time_client(Config) -> idle_time_common([], [{idle_time, 2000}], Config).
  439: 
  440: idle_time_server(Config) -> idle_time_common([{idle_time, 2000}], [], Config).
  441: 
  442: 
  443: idle_time_common(DaemonExtraOpts, ClientExtraOpts, Config) ->
  444:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  445:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  446: 
  447:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  448: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  449: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}
  450:                                              | DaemonExtraOpts
  451:                                             ]),
  452:     ConnectionRef =
  453: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  454: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  455: 					  {user_interaction, false}
  456:                                           | ClientExtraOpts
  457:                                          ]),
  458:     {ok, Id1} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ConnectionRef),
  459:     {ok, Id2} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ConnectionRef),
  460:     ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Id2),
  461:     timer:sleep(2500),
  462:     {ok, Id3} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ConnectionRef),
  463:     ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Id1),
  464:     ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Id3),
  465:     timer:sleep(1000),
  466:     {ok, Id4} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ConnectionRef),
  467:     timer:sleep(2500),
  468:     {ok, Id5} = ssh_sftp:start_channel(ConnectionRef),
  469:     ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Id4),
  470:     ssh_sftp:stop_channel(Id5),
  471:     receive
  472:     after 10000 ->
  473: 	    {error, closed} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, 1000)
  474:     end,
  475:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  476: 
  477: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  478: max_initial_idle_time(Config) ->
  479:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  480:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  481: 
  482:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  483: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  484: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2},
  485:                                              {max_initial_idle_time, 2000}
  486:                                             ]),
  487:     ConnectionRef =
  488: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  489: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  490: 					  {user_interaction, false}
  491:                                          ]),
  492:     timer:sleep(8000),
  493:     {error, closed} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, 1000),
  494:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  495: 
  496: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  497: %%% Test that ssh:shell/2 works
  498: shell(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  499:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  500:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  501:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  502:    
  503:     {_Pid, _Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  504: 					       {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  505:     ct:sleep(500),
  506: 
  507:     IO = ssh_test_lib:start_io_server(),
  508:     Shell = ssh_test_lib:start_shell(Port, IO, [{user_dir,UserDir}]),
  509:     receive
  510: 	{'EXIT', _, _} = Exit ->
  511:             ct:log("~p:~p ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,Exit]),
  512: 	    ct:fail(no_ssh_connection);  
  513: 	ErlShellStart ->
  514: 	    ct:log("Erlang shell start: ~p~n", [ErlShellStart]),
  515: 	    do_shell(IO, Shell)
  516:     after 
  517: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  518:     end.
  519:     
  520: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  521: %%% Test that ssh:shell/2 works when attaching to a open TCP-connection
  522: shell_socket(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  523:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  524:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  525:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  526: 
  527:     {_Pid, Host0, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  528: 					       {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  529:     Host = ssh_test_lib:mangle_connect_address(Host0),
  530:     ct:sleep(500),
  531: 
  532:     %% First test with active mode:
  533:     {ok,ActiveSock} = gen_tcp:connect(Host,
  534:                                       Port,
  535:                                       [{active,true}]),
  536:     {error,not_passive_mode} = ssh:shell(ActiveSock),
  537:     ct:log("~p:~p active tcp socket failed ok", [?MODULE,?LINE]),
  538:     gen_tcp:close(ActiveSock),
  539: 
  540:     %% Secondly, test with an UDP socket:
  541:     {ok,BadSock} = gen_udp:open(0),
  542:     {error,not_tcp_socket} = ssh:shell(BadSock),
  543:     ct:log("~p:~p udp socket failed ok", [?MODULE,?LINE]),
  544:     gen_udp:close(BadSock),
  545: 
  546:     %% And finally test with passive mode (which should work):
  547:     IO = ssh_test_lib:start_io_server(),
  548:     {ok,Sock} = gen_tcp:connect(Host, Port, [{active,false}]),
  549:     Shell = ssh_test_lib:start_shell(Sock, IO, [{user_dir,UserDir}]),
  550:     gen_tcp:controlling_process(Sock, Shell),
  551:     Shell ! start,
  552: 
  553:     receive
  554: 	{'EXIT', _, _} = Exit ->
  555:             ct:log("~p:~p ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,Exit]),
  556: 	    ct:fail(no_ssh_connection);
  557: 	ErlShellStart ->
  558: 	    ct:log("Erlang shell start: ~p~n", [ErlShellStart]),
  559: 	    do_shell(IO, Shell)
  560:     after
  561: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  562:     end.
  563: 
  564: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  565: %%% Test that ssh:shell/2 works when attaching to a open SSH-connection
  566: shell_ssh_conn(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  567:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  568:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  569:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  570: 
  571:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  572: 					       {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  573:     ct:sleep(500),
  574: 
  575:     IO = ssh_test_lib:start_io_server(),
  576:     C = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  577:                                       {user_dir, UserDir},
  578:                                       {user_interaction, false}]),
  579:     Shell = ssh_test_lib:start_shell(C, IO, undefined),
  580:     receive
  581: 	{'EXIT', _, _} = Exit ->
  582:             ct:log("~p:~p ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,Exit]),
  583: 	    ct:fail(no_ssh_connection);
  584: 	ErlShellStart ->
  585: 	    ct:log("Erlang shell start: ~p~n", [ErlShellStart]),
  586: 	    do_shell(IO, Shell)
  587:     after
  588: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  589:     end.
  590: 
  591: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  592: cli(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  593:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  594:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  595:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  596:     
  597:     TmpDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir,Config), "tmp"),
  598:     ok = ssh_test_lib:del_dirs(TmpDir),
  599:     ok = file:make_dir(TmpDir),
  600: 
  601:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  602: 					       {password, "morot"},
  603: 					       {ssh_cli, {ssh_test_cli, [cli,TmpDir]}}, 
  604: 					       {subsystems, []},
  605: 					       {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  606:     ct:sleep(500),
  607:     
  608:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  609: 						      {user, "foo"},
  610: 						      {password, "morot"},
  611: 						      {user_interaction, false},
  612: 						      {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  613:     
  614:     {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  615:     ssh_connection:shell(ConnectionRef, ChannelId),
  616:     ssh_connection:send(ConnectionRef, ChannelId, <<"q">>),
  617:     receive 
  618: 	{ssh_cm, ConnectionRef,
  619: 	 {data,0,0, <<"\r\nYou are accessing a dummy, type \"q\" to exit\r\n\n">>}} ->
  620: 	    ssh_connection:send(ConnectionRef, ChannelId, <<"q">>)
  621:     after 
  622: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  623:     end,
  624:     
  625:     receive 
  626:      	{ssh_cm, ConnectionRef,{closed, ChannelId}} ->
  627:      	    ok
  628:     after 
  629: 	30000 -> ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
  630:     end.
  631: 
  632: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  633: %%% Test that SSH client receives exit-status 0 on successful command execution
  634: cli_exit_normal(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  635:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  636:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  637:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  638: 
  639:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  640:                            {password, "morot"},
  641:                            {ssh_cli, {ssh_cli, [fun (_) -> spawn(fun () -> ok end) end]}},
  642:                            {subsystems, []},
  643:                            {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  644:     ct:sleep(500),
  645: 
  646:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  647:                               {user, "foo"},
  648:                               {password, "morot"},
  649:                               {user_interaction, false},
  650:                               {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  651: 
  652:     {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  653:     ssh_connection:shell(ConnectionRef, ChannelId),
  654:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId, _ExpectedExitStatus = 0).
  655: 
  656: %%---------------------------------------------------------
  657: %%% Test that SSH client receives user provided exit-status
  658: cli_exit_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  659:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  660:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  661:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  662:     NonZeroExitStatus = 7,
  663: 
  664:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},{user_dir, UserDir},
  665:                            {password, "morot"},
  666:                            {ssh_cli, {ssh_cli, [fun (_) ->
  667:                                                         spawn(fun () -> exit({exit_status, NonZeroExitStatus}) end)
  668:                                                 end]}},
  669:                            {subsystems, []},
  670:                            {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  671:     ct:sleep(500),
  672: 
  673:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  674:                               {user, "foo"},
  675:                               {password, "morot"},
  676:                               {user_interaction, false},
  677:                               {user_dir, UserDir}]),
  678: 
  679:     {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  680:     ssh_connection:shell(ConnectionRef, ChannelId),
  681:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId, NonZeroExitStatus).
  682: 
  683: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  684: %%% Test that get correct error message if you try to start a daemon
  685: %%% on an address that already runs a daemon see also seq10667
  686: daemon_already_started(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  687:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  688:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  689: 
  690:     {Pid, _Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  691: 					      {user_dir, UserDir},
  692: 					      {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  693:     {error, eaddrinuse} = ssh_test_lib:daemon(Port, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
  694: 						     {user_dir, UserDir},
  695: 						     {failfun,
  696: 						      fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  697:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  698: 
  699: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  700: %%% Test that a failed daemon start does not leave the port open
  701: 
  702: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% REWRITE! %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  703: %%% 1) check that {error,_} is not  {error,eaddrinuse}
  704: %%% 2) instead of ssh_test_lib:daemon second time, use gen_tcp:listen
  705: 
  706: daemon_error_closes_port(Config) ->
  707:     GoodSystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  708:     Port = inet_port(),
  709:     {error,_} = ssh_test_lib:daemon(Port, []), % No system dir
  710:     case ssh_test_lib:daemon(Port, [{system_dir, GoodSystemDir}]) of
  711:         {error,eaddrinuse} ->
  712:             {fail, "Port leakage"};
  713:         {error,Error} ->
  714:             ct:log("Strange error: ~p",[Error]),
  715:             {fail, "Strange error"};
  716:         {Pid, _Host, Port} ->
  717:             %% Ok
  718:             ssh:stop_daemon(Pid)
  719:     end.
  720:     
  721: inet_port() ->
  722:     {ok, Socket} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{reuseaddr, true}]),
  723:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Socket),
  724:     gen_tcp:close(Socket),
  725:     Port.
  726: 
  727: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  728: %%% check that known_hosts is updated correctly
  729: known_hosts(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  730:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  731:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
  732:     
  733:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{user_dir, PrivDir},{system_dir, SystemDir},
  734: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  735: 
  736:     KnownHosts = filename:join(PrivDir, "known_hosts"),
  737:     file:delete(KnownHosts),
  738:     {error, enoent} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
  739:     ConnectionRef =
  740: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{user_dir, PrivDir},
  741: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  742: 					  {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  743:                                           {save_accepted_host, true}
  744:                                          ]),
  745:     {ok, _Channel} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  746:     ok = ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
  747:     {ok, Binary} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
  748:     ct:log("known_hosts:~n~p",[Binary]),
  749:     Lines = string:tokens(binary_to_list(Binary), "\n"),
  750:     [Line] = Lines,
  751:     [HostAndIp, Alg, _KeyData] = string:tokens(Line, " "),
  752: 
  753:     {StoredHost,StoredPort} =
  754:         case HostAndIp of
  755:             "["++X -> [Hpart,":"++Pstr] = string:tokens(X, "]"),
  756:                       {Hpart,list_to_integer(Pstr)};
  757:             _ -> {HostAndIp,Port}
  758:         end,
  759:     
  760:     true = ssh_test_lib:match_ip(StoredHost, Host) andalso (Port==StoredPort),
  761:     "ssh-" ++ _ = Alg,
  762:     NLines = length(binary:split(Binary, <<"\n">>, [global,trim_all])),
  763:     ct:log("NLines = ~p~n~p", [NLines,Binary]),
  764:     if
  765:         NLines>1 -> ct:fail("wrong num lines", []);
  766:         NLines<1 -> ct:fail("wrong num lines", []);
  767:         true -> ok
  768:     end,
  769: 
  770:     _ConnectionRef2 =
  771: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{user_dir, PrivDir},
  772: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  773: 					  {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  774:                                           {save_accepted_host, true}
  775:                                          ]),
  776:     {ok, Binary2} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
  777:     case Binary of
  778:         Binary2 -> ok;
  779:         _ -> ct:log("2nd differ~n~p", [Binary2]),
  780:              ct:fail("wrong num lines", [])
  781:     end,
  782: 
  783:     Binary3 = <<"localhost,",Binary/binary>>,
  784:     ok = file:write_file(KnownHosts, Binary3),
  785:      _ConnectionRef3 =
  786: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{user_dir, PrivDir},
  787: 					  {user_interaction, false},
  788: 					  {silently_accept_hosts, true},
  789:                                           {save_accepted_host, true}
  790:                                          ]),
  791:     ct:log("New known_hosts:~n~p",[Binary3]),
  792:     {ok, Binary4} = file:read_file(KnownHosts),
  793:     case Binary3 of
  794:         Binary4 -> ok;
  795:         _ -> ct:log("2nd differ~n~p", [Binary4]),
  796:              ct:fail("wrong num lines", [])
  797:     end,
  798: 
  799: 
  800:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  801: 
  802: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------

  808:

  842:     false= ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h22", 1234, 'ssh-ed448', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  843:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h23",   22, 'ssh-ed448', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  844:     
  845:     false =  ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h11", 22, 'ssh-ed448', [{user_dir,Dir}]),

  847: 
  848:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key3, "h31",   22, 'ssh-rsa',     [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  849:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key3, "h31",   22, 'rsa-sha2-256',[{user_dir,Dir}]),
  850: 
  851:     ok.

  853: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  854: ssh_file_is_host_key_misc(Config) ->
  855:     Dir = ssh_test_lib:create_random_dir(Config),
  856:     ct:log("Dir = ~p", [Dir]),
  857:     KnownHosts = filename:join(Dir, "known_hosts"),
  858: 
  859:     Key1 = {#'ECPoint'{point = <<73,72,235,162,96,101,154,59,217,114,123,192,96,105,250,29,
  860:                                  214,76,60,63,167,21,221,118,246,168,152,2,7,172,137,125>>},
  861:             {namedCurve,?'id-Ed25519'}},
  862:     Key2 = {#'ECPoint'{point = <<95,215,68,155,89,180,97,253,44,231,135,236,97,106,212,106,29,
  863:                                  161,52,36,133,167,14,31,138,14,167,93,128,233,103,120,237,241,
  864:                                  36,118,155,70,199,6,27,214,120,61,241,229,15,108,209,250,26,
  865:                                  190,175,232,37,97,128>>},
  866:             {namedCurve,?'id-Ed448'}},
  867:     FileContents = <<"h11,h12,!h12 ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIElI66JgZZo72XJ7wGBp+h3WTDw/pxXddvaomAIHrIl9\n",
  868:                      %% Key revoked later in file:
  869:                      "h22 ssh-ed448 AAAACXNzaC1lZDQ0OAAAADlf10SbWbRh/Sznh+xhatRqHaE0JIWnDh"
  870:                                                              "+KDqddgOlneO3xJHabRscGG9Z4PfHlD2zR+hq+r+glYYA=\n",
  871:                      "@revoked h22 ssh-ed448 AAAACXNzaC1lZDQ0OAAAADlf10SbWbRh/Sznh+xhatRqHaE0JIWnDh"
  872:                                                              "+KDqddgOlneO3xJHabRscGG9Z4PfHlD2zR+hq+r+glYYA=\n",
  873:                      "h21 ssh-ed448 AAAACXNzaC1lZDQ0OAAAADlf10SbWbRh/Sznh+xhatRqHaE0JIWnDh"
  874:                                                              "+KDqddgOlneO3xJHabRscGG9Z4PfHlD2zR+hq+r+glYYA=\n"
  875:                    >>,
  876:     ok = file:write_file(KnownHosts, FileContents),
  877: 
  878:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key1, "h11",   22, 'ssh-ed25519', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  879:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h21",   22, 'ssh-ed448',   [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  880: 
  881:     true = ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h21",   22, 'ssh-ed448',   [{user_dir,Dir},
  882:                                                                    {key_cb_private,[{optimize,space}]}]),
  883:     %% Check revoked key:
  884:     {error,revoked_key} =
  885:         ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h22",   22, 'ssh-ed448',   [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  886:     {error,revoked_key} =
  887:         ssh_file:is_host_key(Key2, "h22",   22, 'ssh-ed448',   [{user_dir,Dir},
  888:                                                                 {key_cb_private,[{optimize,space}]}]),
  889:     %% Check key with "!" in pattern:
  890:     false= ssh_file:is_host_key(Key1, "h12",   22, 'ssh-ed25519', [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  891: 
  892:     ok.
  893: 
  894: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  895: ssh_file_is_auth_key(Config) ->
  896:     Dir = ssh_test_lib:create_random_dir(Config),
  897:     ct:log("Dir = ~p", [Dir]),
  898:     AuthKeys = filename:join(Dir, "authorized_keys"),
  899: 
  900:     Key1 = {#'ECPoint'{point = <<73,72,235,162,96,101,154,59,217,114,123,192,96,105,250,29,
  901:                                  214,76,60,63,167,21,221,118,246,168,152,2,7,172,137,125>>},
  902:             {namedCurve,?'id-Ed25519'}},
  903:     Key2 = {#'ECPoint'{point = <<95,215,68,155,89,180,97,253,44,231,135,236,97,106,212,106,29,
  904:                                  161,52,36,133,167,14,31,138,14,167,93,128,233,103,120,237,241,
  905:                                  36,118,155,70,199,6,27,214,120,61,241,229,15,108,209,250,26,
  906:                                  190,175,232,37,97,128>>},
  907:             {namedCurve,?'id-Ed448'}},
  908:     FileContents = <<" \n",
  909:                      "# A test file\n",
  910:                      "ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIElI66JgZZo72XJ7wGBp+h3WTDw/pxXddvaomAIHrIl9 foo@example.com\n",
  911:                      "no-X11-forwarding,pty ssh-ed448 AAAACXNzaC1lZDQ0OAAAADlf10SbWbRh/Sznh+xhatRqHaE0JIWnDh"
  912:                                                              "+KDqddgOlneO3xJHabRscGG9Z4PfHlD2zR+hq+r+glYYA= bar@example.com\n"
  913:                    >>,
  914:     ok = file:write_file(AuthKeys, FileContents),
  915: 
  916:     true = ssh_file:is_auth_key(Key1, "donald_duck", [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  917:     true = ssh_file:is_auth_key(Key2, "mickey_mouse", [{user_dir,Dir}]),
  918: 
  919:     true = ssh_file:is_auth_key(Key1, "donald_duck", [{user_dir,Dir},{key_cb_private,[{optimize,space}]}]),
  920:     true = ssh_file:is_auth_key(Key2, "mickey_mouse", [{user_dir,Dir},{key_cb_private,[{optimize,space}]}]),
  921: 
  922:     ok.
  923: 
  924: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  925: 
  926: %%% Test that we can use keyes protected by pass phrases
  927: pass_phrase(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  928:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  929:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  930:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  931:     PhraseArg = proplists:get_value(pass_phrase, Config),
  932: 
  933:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  934: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  935: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  936:     ConnectionRef =
  937: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  938: 					  PhraseArg,
  939: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
  940: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
  941:     {ok, _ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  942:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  943: 
  944: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  945: %%% Test that we can use key callback
  946: key_callback(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  947:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  948:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
  949:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  950:     NoPubKeyDir = filename:join(UserDir, "nopubkey"),
  951:     file:make_dir(NoPubKeyDir),
  952: 
  953:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  954: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
  955: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  956: 
  957:     ConnectOpts = [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
  958:                    {user_dir, NoPubKeyDir},
  959:                    {user_interaction, false},
  960:                    {key_cb, ssh_key_cb}],
  961: 
  962:     ConnectionRef = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, ConnectOpts),
  963: 
  964:     {ok, _ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
  965:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
  966: 
  967:

  973:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  974: 
  975:     NoPubKeyDir = filename:join(UserDir, "nopubkey"),
  976:     file:make_dir(NoPubKeyDir),
  977: 
  978:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
  979:                                              {user_dir, UserDir},
  980:                                              {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
  981:

  983:

  985:                    {user_dir, NoPubKeyDir},

  990: 
  991:     {ok, _ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),

  995: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  996: %%% Test that client does not hang if disconnects due to internal error
  997: internal_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  998:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  999:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1000:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1001:     SystemDir = filename:join(PrivDir, system),
 1002:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1003:                                              {user_dir, UserDir},
 1004:                                              {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1005: 
 1006:     %% Now provoke an error in the following connect:
 1007:     file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "system/ssh_host_rsa_key")), 
 1008:     file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "system/ssh_host_dsa_key")), 
 1009:     file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "system/ssh_host_ecdsa_key")),
 1010:     file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "system/ssh_host_ed25519_key")), 
 1011:     file:delete(filename:join(PrivDir, "system/ssh_host_ed448_key")), 
 1012: 
 1013:     {error, Error} =
 1014:         ssh:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1015:                                  {save_accepted_host, false},
 1016:                                  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1017:                                  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1018:     check_error(Error),
 1019:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
 1020:

 1026:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1027:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1028:                                              {preferred_algorithms, ssh_transport:supported_algorithms()},
 1029: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1030: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),

 1032: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{preferred_algorithms, ssh_transport:supported_algorithms()},
 1033:                                           {silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1034: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1035: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),

 1038:     ok = ssh_connection:send(ConnectionRef, ChannelId, << >>),

 1042: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1043: %%% Test ssh:connection_info([peername, sockname])
 1044: peername_sockname(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1045:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1046:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1047:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1048: 
 1049:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1050: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1051: 					     {subsystems, [{"peername_sockname",
 1052: 							    {ssh_peername_sockname_server, []}}
 1053: 							  ]}
 1054: 					    ]),
 1055:     ConnectionRef =
 1056: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1057: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1058: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1059:     {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
 1060:     success = ssh_connection:subsystem(ConnectionRef, ChannelId, "peername_sockname", infinity),
 1061:     [{peer, {_Name, {HostPeerClient,PortPeerClient} = ClientPeer}}] =
 1062: 	ssh:connection_info(ConnectionRef, [peer]),
 1063:     [{sockname, {HostSockClient,PortSockClient} = ClientSock}] =
 1064: 	ssh:connection_info(ConnectionRef, [sockname]),
 1065:     ct:log("Client: ~p ~p", [ClientPeer, ClientSock]),
 1066:     receive
 1067: 	{ssh_cm, ConnectionRef, {data, ChannelId, _, Response}} ->
 1068: 	    {PeerNameSrv,SockNameSrv} = binary_to_term(Response),
 1069: 	    {HostPeerSrv,PortPeerSrv} = PeerNameSrv,
 1070: 	    {HostSockSrv,PortSockSrv} = SockNameSrv,
 1071: 	    ct:log("Server: ~p ~p", [PeerNameSrv, SockNameSrv]),
 1072: 	    host_equal(HostPeerSrv, HostSockClient),
 1073: 	    PortPeerSrv = PortSockClient,
 1074: 	    host_equal(HostSockSrv, HostPeerClient),
 1075: 	    PortSockSrv = PortPeerClient,
 1076: 	    host_equal(HostSockSrv, Host),
 1077: 	    PortSockSrv = Port
 1078:     after 10000 ->
 1079: 	    ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
 1080:     end.
 1081: 
 1082: host_equal(H1, H2) ->
 1083:     not ordsets:is_disjoint(ips(H1), ips(H2)).
 1084: 
 1085: ips(IP) when is_tuple(IP) -> ordsets:from_list([IP]);
 1086: ips(Name) when is_list(Name) ->
 1087:     {ok,#hostent{h_addr_list=IPs4}} = inet:gethostbyname(Name,inet),
 1088:     {ok,#hostent{h_addr_list=IPs6}} = inet:gethostbyname(Name,inet6),
 1089:     ordsets:from_list(IPs4++IPs6).
 1090: 
 1091: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1092: 
 1093: %%% Client receives close when server closes
 1094: close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1095:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1096:     SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1097:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1098:     
 1099:     {Server, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1100: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1101: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1102:     Client =
 1103: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1104: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1105: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1106:     {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(Client, infinity),
 1107:     
 1108:     ssh:stop_daemon(Server),
 1109:     receive 
 1110: 	{ssh_cm, Client,{closed, ChannelId}} ->  
 1111: 	    ok
 1112:     after 5000 ->
 1113: 	    ct:fail("timeout ~p:~p",[?MODULE,?LINE])
 1114:     end.
 1115: 
 1116: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1117: %%% Simulate that we try to close an already closed connection
 1118: double_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1119:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1120:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1121:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
 1122:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
 1123: 
 1124:     {_Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1125: 					     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1126: 					     {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]},
 1127: 					     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1128:     CM = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1129: 					   {user_dir, UserDir},
 1130: 					    {user, "vego"},
 1131: 					    {password, "morot"},
 1132: 					    {user_interaction, false}]),
 1133:     
 1134:     exit(CM, {shutdown, normal}),
 1135:     ok = ssh:close(CM).
 1136: 
 1137: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1138: daemon_opt_fd(Config) ->
 1139:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1140:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1141:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
 1142:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
 1143: 
 1144:     {ok,S1} = gen_tcp:listen(0,[]),
 1145:     ct:log("Socket S1 = ~p", [S1]),
 1146:     
 1147:     {ok,Fd1} = prim_inet:getfd(S1),
 1148:     
 1149:     {ok,Pid1} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1150: 			       {fd,Fd1},
 1151: 			       {user_dir, UserDir},
 1152: 			       {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]},
 1153: 			       {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1154:     
 1155:     {ok,{_Host1,Port1}} = inet:sockname(S1),
 1156:     C1 = ssh_test_lib:connect(Port1, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1157: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1158: 					  {user, "vego"},
 1159: 					  {password, "morot"},
 1160: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1161:     exit(C1, {shutdown, normal}),
 1162:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid1),
 1163:     gen_tcp:close(S1).
 1164: 
 1165: 
 1166: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1167: multi_daemon_opt_fd(Config) ->
 1168:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1169:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1170:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
 1171:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
 1172: 
 1173:     Test = 
 1174: 	fun() ->
 1175: 		{ok,S} = gen_tcp:listen(0,[]),
 1176:                 ct:log("Socket S = ~p", [S]),
 1177: 		{ok,Fd} = prim_inet:getfd(S),
 1178: 
 1179: 		{ok,Pid} = ssh:daemon(0, [{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1180: 					  {fd,Fd},
 1181: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1182: 					  {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]},
 1183: 					  {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1184: 
 1185: 		{ok,{_Host,Port}} = inet:sockname(S),
 1186: 		C = ssh_test_lib:connect(Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1187: 							  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1188: 							  {user, "vego"},
 1189: 							  {password, "morot"},
 1190: 							  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1191: 		{S,Pid,C}
 1192: 	end,
 1193: 
 1194:     Tests = [Test(),Test(),Test(),Test(),Test(),Test()],
 1195: 
 1196:     [begin 
 1197: 	 gen_tcp:close(S),
 1198: 	 ssh:stop_daemon(Pid),
 1199: 	 exit(C, {shutdown, normal})
 1200:      end || {S,Pid,C} <- Tests].
 1201: 
 1202: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1203: packet_size(Config) ->
 1204:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1205:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), 
 1206:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
 1207:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
 1208: 
 1209:     {Server, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1210: 						{user_dir, UserDir},
 1211: 						{user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]}]),
 1212:     Conn =
 1213: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1214: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1215: 					  {user_interaction, false},
 1216: 					  {user, "vego"},
 1217: 					  {password, "morot"}]),
 1218:     lists:foreach(
 1219:       fun(MaxPacketSize) ->
 1220:               ct:log("Try max_packet_size=~p",[MaxPacketSize]),
 1221:               {ok,Ch} = ssh_connection:session_channel(Conn, 1000, MaxPacketSize, 60000),
 1222:               ok = ssh_connection:shell(Conn, Ch),
 1223:               rec(Server, Conn, Ch, MaxPacketSize),
 1224:               ssh_connection:close(Conn, Ch)
 1225:       end, [0, 1, 10, 25]),
 1226: 
 1227:     ssh:close(Conn),
 1228:     ssh:stop_daemon(Server),
 1229:     ok.
 1230: 
 1231: 
 1232: rec(Server, Conn, Ch, MaxSz) ->
 1233:     receive
 1234:         {ssh_cm,Conn,{data,Ch,_,M}} when byte_size(M) =< MaxSz ->
 1235:             ct:log("~p: ~p",[MaxSz,M]),
 1236:             rec(Server, Conn, Ch, MaxSz);
 1237:         {ssh_cm,Conn,{data,Ch,_,_}} = M ->
 1238:             ct:log("Max pkt size=~p. Got ~p",[MaxSz,M]),
 1239:             ssh:close(Conn),
 1240:             ssh:stop_daemon(Server),
 1241:             ct:fail("Does not obey max_packet_size=~p",[MaxSz])
 1242:     after
 1243:         2000 -> 
 1244:             ct:log("~p: ok!",[MaxSz]),
 1245:             ok
 1246:     end.
 1247: 
 1248: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1249: shell_no_unicode(Config) ->
 1250:     new_do_shell(proplists:get_value(io,Config),
 1251: 		 [new_prompt,
 1252: 		  {type,"io:format(\"hej ~p~n\",[42])."},
 1253: 		  {expect,"hej 42"},
 1254: 		  {expect,"ok"},
 1255: 		  new_prompt,
 1256: 		  {type,"exit()."}
 1257: 		 ]).
 1258: 	      
 1259: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1260: shell_unicode_string(Config) ->
 1261:     new_do_shell(proplists:get_value(io,Config),
 1262: 		 [new_prompt,
 1263: 		  {type,"io:format(\"~ts~n\",[\"\"])."},
 1264: 		  {expect,""},
 1265: 		  {expect,"ok"},
 1266: 		  new_prompt,
 1267: 		  {type,"exit()."}
 1268: 		 ]).
 1269: 
 1270: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1271: %%% Test basic connection with openssh_zlib
 1272: openssh_zlib_basic_test(Config) ->
 1273:     case ssh_test_lib:ssh_supports(['zlib@openssh.com',none], compression) of
 1274: 	{false,L} ->
 1275: 	    {skip, io_lib:format("~p compression is not supported",[L])};
 1276: 
 1277: 	true ->
 1278: 	    SystemDir = filename:join(proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config), system),
 1279: 	    UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1280: 
 1281: 	    {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1282: 						     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1283: 						     {preferred_algorithms,[{compression, ['zlib@openssh.com']}]},
 1284: 						     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1285: 	    ConnectionRef =
 1286: 		ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1287: 						  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1288: 						  {user_interaction, false},
 1289: 						  {preferred_algorithms,[{compression, ['zlib@openssh.com',
 1290: 											none]}]}
 1291: 						 ]),
 1292: 	    ok = ssh:close(ConnectionRef),
 1293: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(Pid)
 1294:     end.
 1295: 
 1296: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1297: ssh_info_print(Config) ->
 1298:     %% Just check that ssh_print:info() crashes
 1299:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1300:     PrintFile = filename:join(PrivDir,info),
 1301:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
 1302:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
 1303:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1304: 
 1305:     Parent = self(),
 1306:     UnexpFun = fun(Msg,_Peer) ->
 1307: 		       Parent ! {unexpected,Msg,self()},
 1308: 		       skip
 1309: 	       end,
 1310:     ConnFun = fun(_,_,_) -> Parent ! {connect,self()} end,
 1311: 
 1312:     {DaemonRef, Host, Port} = 
 1313: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 1314: 			     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1315: 			     {password, "morot"},
 1316: 			     {unexpectedfun, UnexpFun},
 1317: 			     {connectfun, ConnFun},
 1318: 			     {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1319:     ClientConnRef1 =
 1320: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1321: 					  {user, "foo"},
 1322: 					  {password, "morot"},
 1323: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1324: 					  {unexpectedfun, UnexpFun},
 1325: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1326:     ClientConnRef2 =
 1327: 	ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1328: 					  {user, "foo"},
 1329: 					  {password, "morot"},
 1330: 					  {user_dir, UserDir},
 1331: 					  {unexpectedfun, UnexpFun},
 1332: 					  {user_interaction, false}]),
 1333:     receive
 1334: 	{connect,DaemonConnRef} ->
 1335: 	    ct:log("DaemonRef=~p, DaemonConnRef=~p, ClientConnRefs=~p",[DaemonRef, DaemonConnRef, 
 1336: 									[ClientConnRef1,ClientConnRef2]
 1337: 								       ])
 1338:     after 2000 ->
 1339: 	    ok
 1340:     end,
 1341: 
 1342:     {ok,D} = file:open(PrintFile, write),
 1343:     ssh_info:print(D),
 1344:     ok = file:close(D),
 1345: 
 1346:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(PrintFile),
 1347:     ct:log("~s",[Bin]),
 1348: 
 1349:     receive
 1350: 	{unexpected, Msg, Pid} ->
 1351: 	    ct:log("~p got unexpected msg ~p",[Pid,Msg]),
 1352: 	    ct:log("process_info(~p) = ~n~p",[Pid,process_info(Pid)]),
 1353: 	    ok = ssh:close(ClientConnRef1),
 1354: 	    ok = ssh:close(ClientConnRef2),
 1355: 	    ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonRef),
 1356: 	    {fail,"unexpected msg"}
 1357:     after 1000 ->
 1358: 	    ok = ssh:close(ClientConnRef1),
 1359: 	    ok = ssh:close(ClientConnRef2),
 1360: 	    ok = ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonRef)
 1361:     end.
 1362: 
 1363: 
 1364: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1365: %% Check that a basd pwd is not tried more times. Could cause lock-out
 1366: %% on server
 1367: 
 1368: login_bad_pwd_no_retry1(Config) ->
 1369:     login_bad_pwd_no_retry(Config, "keyboard-interactive,password").
 1370: 
 1371: login_bad_pwd_no_retry2(Config) ->
 1372:     login_bad_pwd_no_retry(Config, "password,keyboard-interactive").
 1373: 
 1374: login_bad_pwd_no_retry3(Config) ->
 1375:     login_bad_pwd_no_retry(Config, "password,publickey,keyboard-interactive").
 1376: 
 1377: login_bad_pwd_no_retry4(Config) ->
 1378:     login_bad_pwd_no_retry(Config, "password,keyboard-interactive").
 1379: 
 1380: login_bad_pwd_no_retry5(Config) ->
 1381:     login_bad_pwd_no_retry(Config, "password,keyboard-interactive,password,password").
 1382: 
 1383: 
 1384: login_bad_pwd_no_retry(Config, AuthMethods) ->
 1385:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1386:     UserDir = filename:join(PrivDir, nopubkey), % to make sure we don't use public-key-auth
 1387:     file:make_dir(UserDir),
 1388:     SysDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1389: 
 1390:     Parent = self(),
 1391:     PwdFun = fun(_, _, _, undefined) -> {false, 1};
 1392: 		(_, _, _,         _) -> Parent ! retry_bad_pwd,
 1393: 					false
 1394: 	     end,
 1395: 
 1396:     {DaemonRef, _Host, Port} = 
 1397: 	ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SysDir},
 1398: 			     {user_dir, UserDir},
 1399: 			     {auth_methods, AuthMethods},
 1400: 			     {user_passwords, [{"foo","somepwd"}]},
 1401: 			     {pwdfun, PwdFun}
 1402: 			    ]),
 1403: 
 1404:     ConnRes = ssh:connect("localhost", Port,
 1405: 			  [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1406: 			   {user, "foo"},
 1407: 			   {password, "badpwd"},
 1408: 			   {user_dir, UserDir},
 1409: 			   {user_interaction, false}]),
 1410: 
 1411:     receive
 1412: 	retry_bad_pwd ->
 1413: 	    ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonRef),
 1414: 	    {fail, "Retry bad password"}
 1415:     after 0 ->
 1416: 	    case ConnRes of
 1417: 		{error,"Unable to connect using the available authentication methods"} ->
 1418: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonRef),
 1419: 		    ok;
 1420: 		{ok,Conn} ->
 1421: 		    ssh:close(Conn),
 1422: 		    ssh:stop_daemon(DaemonRef),
 1423: 		    {fail, "Connect erroneosly succeeded"}
 1424: 	    end
 1425:     end.
 1426: 
 1427: 
 1428: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1429: %%% Test that when shell REPL exit with reason normal client receives status 0
 1430: shell_exit_status(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1431:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1432:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1433:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1434: 
 1435:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1436:                                              {user_dir, UserDir},
 1437:                                              {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]},
 1438:                                              {shell, {?MODULE,always_ok,[]}},
 1439:                                              {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1440:     ConnectionRef =
 1441:         ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1442:                                           {user_dir, UserDir},
 1443:                                           {user, "vego"},
 1444:                                           {password, "morot"},
 1445:                                           {user_interaction, false}]),
 1446: 
 1447:     {ok, ChannelId} = ssh_connection:session_channel(ConnectionRef, infinity),
 1448:     ok = ssh_connection:shell(ConnectionRef, ChannelId),
 1449:     ssh_test_lib:receive_exec_end(ConnectionRef, ChannelId),
 1450:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
 1451: 
 1452: always_ok(_) -> ok.
 1453:     
 1454: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1455: setopts_getopts(Config) ->
 1456:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1457:     SystemDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1458:     UserDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
 1459: 
 1460:     ShellFun = fun (_User, _Peer) -> spawn(fun() -> ok end) end,
 1461:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon([{system_dir, SystemDir},
 1462:                                              {user_dir, UserDir},
 1463:                                              {user_passwords, [{"vego", "morot"}]},
 1464:                                              {shell, ShellFun},
 1465:                                              {failfun, fun ssh_test_lib:failfun/2}]),
 1466:     ConnectionRef =
 1467:         ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, [{silently_accept_hosts, true},
 1468:                                           {quiet_mode, true}, % Just to use quiet_mode once
 1469:                                           {user_dir, UserDir},
 1470:                                           {user, "vego"},
 1471:                                           {password, "morot"},
 1472:                                           {user_interaction, false}]),
 1473:     %% Test get_sock_opts
 1474:     {ok,[{active,once},{deliver,term},{mode,binary},{packet,0}]} =
 1475:         ssh:get_sock_opts(ConnectionRef, [active, deliver, mode, packet]),
 1476: 
 1477:     %% Test to set forbidden opts
 1478:     {error,{not_allowed,[active,deliver,mode,packet]}} =
 1479:         ssh:set_sock_opts(ConnectionRef, [{active,once},{deliver,term},{mode,binary},{packet,0}]),
 1480:     
 1481:     %% Test to set some other opt
 1482:     {ok,[{delay_send,DS0}]} =
 1483:         ssh:get_sock_opts(ConnectionRef, [delay_send]),
 1484:     DS1 = not DS0,
 1485:     ok = ssh:set_sock_opts(ConnectionRef, [{delay_send,DS1}]),
 1486:     {ok,[{delay_send,DS1}]} =
 1487:         ssh:get_sock_opts(ConnectionRef, [delay_send]),
 1488:     
 1489:      ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
 1490: 
 1491: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1492: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 1493: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1494: %% Due to timing the error message may or may not be delivered to
 1495: %% the "tcp-application" before the socket closed message is received
 1496: check_error("Invalid state") -> ok;
 1497: check_error("Connection closed") -> ok;
 1498: check_error("Selection of key exchange algorithm failed"++_) -> ok;
 1499: check_error("No host key available") -> ok;
 1500: check_error(Error) -> ct:fail(Error).
 1501: 
 1502: basic_test(Config) ->
 1503:     ClientOpts = proplists:get_value(client_opts, Config),
 1504:     ServerOpts = proplists:get_value(server_opts, Config),
 1505:     
 1506:     {Pid, Host, Port} = ssh_test_lib:daemon(ServerOpts),
 1507:     CM = ssh_test_lib:connect(Host, Port, ClientOpts),
 1508:     ok = ssh:close(CM),
 1509:     ssh:stop_daemon(Pid).
 1510: 
 1511: do_shell(IO, _Shell) ->
 1512:     new_do_shell(IO, [new_prompt,
 1513:                       {type,"1+1."},
 1514:                       {expect,"2"},
 1515:                       new_prompt,
 1516:                       {type,"exit()."}
 1517:                      ]).
 1518: 
 1519: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1520: wait_for_erlang_first_line(Config) ->
 1521:     receive
 1522: 	{'EXIT', _, _} = Exit ->
 1523:             ct:log("~p:~p ~p", [?MODULE,?LINE,Exit]),
 1524: 	    {fail,no_ssh_connection};
 1525: 	<<"Eshell ",_/binary>> = _ErlShellStart ->
 1526: 	    ct:log("Erlang shell start: ~p~n", [_ErlShellStart]),
 1527: 	    Config;
 1528: 	Other ->
 1529: 	    ct:log("Unexpected answer from ssh server: ~p",[Other]),
 1530: 	    {fail,unexpected_answer}
 1531:     after 10000 ->
 1532: 	    ct:log("No answer from ssh-server"),
 1533: 	    {fail,timeout}
 1534:     end.
 1535: 
 1536: 
 1537: 
 1538: new_do_shell(IO, List) -> new_do_shell(IO, 0, List).
 1539: 
 1540: new_do_shell(IO, N, [new_prompt|More]) ->
 1541:     new_do_shell(IO, N+1, More);
 1542: 
 1543: new_do_shell(IO, N, Ops=[{Order,Arg}|More]) ->
 1544:     Pfx = prompt_prefix(),
 1545:     PfxSize = byte_size(Pfx),
 1546:     receive
 1547: 	_X = <<"\r\n">> ->
 1548: 	    ct:log("Skip newline ~p",[_X]),
 1549: 	    new_do_shell(IO, N, Ops);
 1550: 	
 1551: 	<<P1,"> ">> when (P1-$0)==N -> 
 1552: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1553: 	<<"(",Pfx:PfxSize/binary,")",P1,"> ">> when (P1-$0)==N -> 
 1554: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1555: 	<<"('",Pfx:PfxSize/binary,"')",P1,"> ">> when (P1-$0)==N -> 
 1556: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1557: 
 1558: 	<<P1,P2,"> ">> when (P1-$0)*10 + (P2-$0) == N -> 
 1559: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1560: 	<<"(",Pfx:PfxSize/binary,")",P1,P2,"> ">> when (P1-$0)*10 + (P2-$0) == N -> 
 1561: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1562: 	<<"('",Pfx:PfxSize/binary,"')",P1,P2,"> ">> when (P1-$0)*10 + (P2-$0) == N -> 
 1563: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1564: 
 1565: 	<<P1,P2,P3,"> ">> when (P1-$0)*100 + (P2-$0)*10 + (P3-$0) == N -> 
 1566: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1567: 	<<"(",Pfx:PfxSize/binary,")",P1,P2,P3,"> ">> when (P1-$0)*100 + (P2-$0)*10 + (P3-$0) == N -> 
 1568: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1569: 	<<"('",Pfx:PfxSize/binary,"')",P1,P2,P3,"> ">> when (P1-$0)*100 + (P2-$0)*10 + (P3-$0) == N -> 
 1570: 	    new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Order, Arg, More);
 1571: 
 1572: 	Err when element(1,Err)==error ->
 1573: 	    ct:fail("new_do_shell error: ~p~n",[Err]);
 1574: 
 1575: 	RecBin when Order==expect ; Order==expect_echo ->
 1576: 	    ct:log("received ~p",[RecBin]),
 1577: 	    RecStr = string:strip(unicode:characters_to_list(RecBin)),
 1578: 	    ExpStr = string:strip(Arg),
 1579: 	    case lists:prefix(ExpStr, RecStr) of
 1580: 		true when Order==expect ->
 1581: 		    ct:log("Matched ~ts",[RecStr]),
 1582: 		    new_do_shell(IO, N, More);
 1583: 		true when Order==expect_echo ->
 1584: 		    ct:log("Matched echo ~ts",[RecStr]),
 1585: 		    new_do_shell(IO, N, More);
 1586: 		false ->
 1587: 		    ct:log("*** Expected ~p, but got ~p",[string:strip(ExpStr),RecStr]),
 1588:             new_do_shell(IO, N, Ops)
 1589: 	    end
 1590:     after 30000 ->
 1591: 	    ct:log("Message queue of ~p:~n~p",
 1592: 		   [self(), erlang:process_info(self(), messages)]),
 1593: 	    case Order of
 1594: 		expect -> ct:fail("timeout, expected ~p",[string:strip(Arg)]);
 1595: 		type ->  ct:fail("timeout, no prompt")
 1596: 	    end
 1597:     end;
 1598: 
 1599: new_do_shell(_, _, []) ->
 1600:     ok.
 1601: 
 1602: prompt_prefix() ->
 1603:     case node() of
 1604: 	nonode@nohost -> <<>>;
 1605: 	Node -> list_to_binary(
 1606:                   atom_to_list(Node))
 1607:     end.
 1608: 	    
 1609: 
 1610: new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, type, Str, More) ->
 1611:     ct:log("Matched prompt ~p to trigger sending of next line to server",[N]),
 1612:     IO ! {input, self(), Str++"\r\n"},
 1613:     ct:log("Prompt '~p> ', Sent ~ts",[N,Str++"\r\n"]),
 1614:     new_do_shell(IO, N, More);
 1615: new_do_shell_prompt(IO, N, Op, Str, More) ->
 1616:     ct:log("Matched prompt ~p",[N]),
 1617:     new_do_shell(IO, N, [{Op,Str}|More]).
 1618:
